name: Flyfe's Too Short
description:
To the common fly, every second counts. When your life is as brief and delicate as theirs, you gain an appreciation for the more meaningful things in life. Guide this ambitious fly as he lives his one and only day to the fullest! Travel the world, master the arts, and maybe even find a little romance? There are a few different endings depending on how well you help your little friend to fulfill his dreams - can you get everything on his list and keep him safe until the end?

===============================================================

CONTROLS

Left Click  -  Singular moves or hold Left Click for smooth continuous motion.

Right Click  -  Start Game, Open your checklist, Interact with the locals, and Restart the game should a terrible fate befall your little friend.

===============================================================

This game was developed in three days for the GameDev Insiders Jam #2. All coding and artwork was done using GameMaker Studio 2, while the audio was composed using BeepBox. I've only been coding for a few months and this is my first game jam, so I would greatly appreciate any and all feedback!
